english_measurements.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
english_measurements.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
english_measurements.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe, on 23/9/25.
english_measurements.content: This is to inform you that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation by open trenching method for a total of 812 meters from South Central Road (near HP Petrol pump) to Manish Export in the Nerul division. Accordingly, as per the government decision and the estimate provided by the Hon. Executive Engineer for the asphalt road excavation, you are required to deposit the following charges for the excavation work in the municipal corporation.
english_measurements.total_amount_in_words: Rupees One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One only
english_measurements.payment_instructions: As per the above, please deposit the total amount of Rs. 1,58,31,241/- (Re-establishment charges Rs. 1,23,86,436/-, Supervision charges Rs. 18,57,965/-, Security deposit Rs. 14,24,440/-, and Ground rent Rs. 1,62,400/-) in the accounts department of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation through a Demand Draft (D.D.) and submit a photocopy of the receipt to this office. An agreement for the excavation must also be submitted. Only after this, will permission for road excavation be granted. Please note that as per Notification No. 03/2018 Central Tax (Rate) dated 25 January 2018, the responsibility to pay GST lies with your organization.
english_measurements.name: (Somnath Potare)
english_measurements.surface: New Asphalt Surface / Cable through duct / Number of ducts 3 / New Asphalt Surface (Open Trench Method) / Total Sq. Mtr.
